Smart Waffle Iron: Develop a waffle iron that can connect to your smartphone via Bluetooth. This smart waffle iron can detect the number of waffles you want to make and automatically adjust the cooking time and temperature. It can also provide you with recipe suggestions and nutritional information. With this smart waffle iron, you can enjoy a delicious and healthy breakfast with just a few taps on your phone.

Portable Waffle Iron: Design a lightweight and compact waffle iron that can be easily taken on the go. This portable waffle iron is perfect for camping trips, picnics, or any other outdoor adventure. It's easy to clean and store, making it a great addition to any traveler's kitchen.

Waffle Iron with a Built-In Griddle: Create a waffle iron with a built-in griddle, allowing you to cook a variety of breakfast items, such as pancakes, eggs, and bacon. This versatile appliance saves space and time by eliminating the need for multiple cooking surfaces. The griddle can be adjusted to different temperatures, providing you with a wide range of cooking options.

Automatic Waffle Iron: Develop an automatic waffle iron that can cook multiple waffles at once. This innovative design allows you to enjoy a fluffy and crispy waffle breakfast without any hassle. The automatic waffle iron can be programmed to cook waffles to your desired level of doneness, ensuring a consistent and delicious breakfast every time.

Customizable Waffle Iron: Design a waffle iron with interchangeable plates, allowing you to create different waffle designs and patterns. This customizable waffle iron provides endless possibilities for creative waffle-making, making it a fun and exciting addition to any kitchen. You can switch between different plates to create unique waffle designs, from classic chevrons to intricate patterns.
